parameters.description: Initial nutrient concentration at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for dissolved inorganic nutrient concentration at t=0

parameters.description: Initial phytoplankton concentration at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for phytoplankton at t=0

parameters.description: Initial zooplankton concentration at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for zooplankton at t=0

parameters.description: Maximum specific phytoplankton growth rate
parameters.source: literature-informed prior (typical 0.5-2 d^-1 scaled to timestep)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Maximum phytoplankton specific growth rate under saturating nutrients and optimal temperature

parameters.description: Half-saturation constant for nutrient uptake
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Michaelis–Menten half-saturation for nutrient-limited growth

parameters.description: Maximum zooplankton grazing rate
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Maximum ingestion rate parameter in the grazing functional response

parameters.description: Half-saturation for grazing (controls prey density at half max ingestion)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Half-saturation constant in Holling II/III grazing response

parameters.description: Grazing response shape exponent (>=1 yields Type-III-like low-prey refuge)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Exponent controlling non-linearity of grazing with prey density

parameters.description: Assimilation efficiency converting ingestion into zooplankton growth
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Fraction of grazed phytoplankton biomass assimilated into zooplankton biomass

parameters.description: Phytoplankton non-grazing mortality/exudation rate
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Background loss rate of phytoplankton not due to grazing

parameters.description: Zooplankton linear mortality rate
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Background linear mortality of zooplankton

parameters.description: Zooplankton quadratic mortality (e.g., higher predation/cannibalism at high Z)
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Density-dependent mortality term for zooplankton (quadratic)

parameters.description: Fraction of phytoplankton natural mortality excreted/remineralized back to nutrients
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Remineralization fraction of P losses returning to N pool

parameters.description: Fraction of zooplankton mortality remineralized back to nutrients
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Remineralization fraction of Z losses returning to N pool

parameters.description: Vertical mixing rate toward external nutrient concentration
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Exchange rate that restores N toward an external reservoir (N_in)

parameters.description: External (deep reservoir) nutrient concentration
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Deep or external nutrient concentration that mixing restores the mixed layer toward

parameters.description: Optimal temperature for phytoplankton growth
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Temperature at which phytoplankton growth reaches its maximum

parameters.description: Curvature parameter of Gaussian temperature effect on P growth
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls the breadth of the temperature response; higher values mean narrower optimal range

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for nutrient observations
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for N

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for phytoplankton observations
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for P

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for zooplankton observations
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for Z

parameters.description: Initial value for slow series at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for auxiliary 'slow' series used by infrastructure

parameters.description: Initial value for fast series at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for auxiliary 'fast' series used by infrastructure

parameters.description: Initial value for cots series at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for auxiliary 'cots' series used by infrastructure

parameters.description: Initial value for cotsimm series at first time step
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Initial condition for auxiliary 'cotsimm' series used by infrastructure

parameters.description: AR(1)-type persistence coefficient for slow series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls persistence of the auxiliary 'slow' series; 1.0 is a random-walk-like persistence (deterministic here)

parameters.description: AR(1)-type persistence coefficient for fast series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls persistence of the auxiliary 'fast' series; 1.0 is a random-walk-like persistence (deterministic here)

parameters.description: AR(1)-type persistence coefficient for cots series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls persistence of the auxiliary 'cots' series; 1.0 is a random-walk-like persistence (deterministic here)

parameters.description: AR(1)-type persistence coefficient for cotsimm series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Controls persistence of the auxiliary 'cotsimm' series; 1.0 is a random-walk-like persistence (deterministic here)

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for slow series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for auxiliary 'slow' series

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for fast series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for auxiliary 'fast' series

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for cots series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for auxiliary 'cots' series

parameters.description: Observation error (lognormal) for cotsimm series
parameters.enhanced_semantic_description: Standard deviation of log-observation error for auxiliary 'cotsimm' series
